case.title: Confident female seeks diligent male - 29
case.text:
I seek a man who will be willing, happy and articulate in fulfilling my desires. You will be tall, under 40, professional, erudite and convivial. Importantly you will be most comfortable in relinquishing control, and putting my needs first.
I am intelligent, attractive, and often demanding. I work in the City, and live centrally. I am looking for an ongoing arrangement.
Please tell me a little about yourself, along with sending a photo.
